sentences.en: A few years later , however, the Court relaxed this seemingly stringent requirement.
sentences.cn: 但几年以后, 最高法院放宽了这项看起来很苛刻的要求.

sentences.en: Financiers are calling for a relaxation of these stringent measures.
sentences.cn: 金融家呼吁对这些严厉的措施予以放宽.

sentences.en: He announced that there would be more stringent controls on the possession of weapons.
sentences.cn: 他宣布将对武器的持有实行更严格的控制。

sentences.en: In particular, there were numerous " toxic hotspots " which needed more stringent controls.
sentences.cn: 特别是, 有无数的 “ 有毒的潜在危险区 ” 需要更严厉的控制.

sentences.en: It is important to take stringent precautions against contamination in the lab.
sentences.cn: 必须特别注意实验室的污染.

sentences.en: It was necessary to satisfy stringent criteria to justify its use.
sentences.cn: 使用苛刻的标准来评价其实用性是完全必要的.

sentences.en: Its drugtesting procedures are the most stringent in the world.
sentences.cn: 其药物检测程序是世界上最严格的。

sentences.en: People began verify their scientific hypotheses by stringent tests.
sentences.cn: 人们开始用精确的试验证实自己的科学假说.

sentences.en: Some of the conditions in the contract are too stringent.
sentences.cn: 合同中有几项条件太苛刻.
严格的空气质量管理条例

sentences.en: The Act imposes more stringent regulations on atmospheric pollution.
sentences.cn: 法案对大气污染作出更为严格的规定.

sentences.en: The conditions imposed on volunteers were stringent.
sentences.cn: 对志愿者的限定条件非常严格。

sentences.en: This is likely to deter stringent environmental regulations.
sentences.cn: 这就很可能阻止严厉的环境管制.

sentences.en: To protect the environment, most industrial societies have established stringent laws.
sentences.cn: 为了保护环境, 大多数工业领域制定了严格的法律.
